title: Internet Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/30/18
itunes:title: Internet Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/30/18
description:
George Noory and technology expert Lauren Weinstein explore his career developing early forms of the internet, as well as the threats of electronic election tampering and social media issues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
